name: Abyss Actor's Curtain Call
description: If an "Abyss Script" Spell Card or effect was activated this turn: Add face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monsters from your Extra Deck to your hand, up to the number of "Abyss Script" Spells in your GY, then you can Special Summon "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monsters with different names from your hand, up to the number of monsters added to your hand. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Abyss Actors Curtain Call" per turn.
